arts.ttl: Seismic Alexander Isak update drops hours before Newcastle vs Liverpool encounter
arts.sum: Newcastle United striker Alexander Isak has been linked with a move to Liverpool this summer. The Swedish striker has made it clear to the Magpies that he is not interested in playing for them. Liverpool had an offer rejected for the attacker, a package worth £120million, and the Magpies are keen on keeping him at […] The post Seismic Alexander Isak update drops hours before Newcastle vs Liverpool encounter appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Alexander Isak to Liverpool moves step closer as massive striker bid made
arts.sum: Newcastle United are desperately trying to sign two strikers before the summer transfer window closes, as Alexander Isak waits for Liverpool to return with another bid

arts.ttl: Newcastle in €60m striker bid ahead of Liverpool clash as agreement close
arts.sum: Newcastle have failed with a bid for Jorgen Strand Larsen as Wolves close in on the sale of Fabio Silva to Borussia Dortmund . The St. James' Park club have placed a bid worth around €58 million for Wolves striker Jorgen Strand Larsen, only to be told that the Norway international is unavailable this summer.

arts.ttl: Newcastle make fresh Alexander Isak point just hours before crunch Liverpool clash
arts.sum: Newcastle striker Alexander Isak is pushing to join Liverpool this summer, but it remains to be seen whether a deal can be reached before the transfer window slams shut
